---
name: Program crash / instability
about: Report a Windows program crashing or behaving erratically while using the driver
title: "[PROGRAMCRASH]"
labels: bug
assignees: ''

---

**Driver version**
Please specify the version number, or Git commit if you built it yourself, and whether you're using a debug or release build

**Windows version**
E.g. Windows 3.1, WfW 3.11, Windows 95, Windows 98 FE/SE, Windows Me

**Windows Operating mode**
Standard, Enhanced, or Both (for WfW 3.11 or later, it will always be Enhanced)

**Does bug also occur with standard VGA driver?**
(If the answer is yes, maybe this shouldn't be filed as an issue here! Depending on your hardware configuration, you may want to try `patcher9x` to fix instabilities with these old Windows versions.)

**Have you checked the integrity of the driver files as per instructions in `README.md`?**
(If the answer is no, please try that first, if you can, just to make sure)

**Type of Machine (Real or Virtual)**
E.g. Real machine with BIOS firmware, Real machine with UEFI firmware, VMware VM, VirtualBox VM, QEMU VM, etc.

**What mode(s) does this issue occur in?**
E.g. 1024×768×24 – if you've tried more than one, please list them all

**Is/are there any mode(s) where this issue does not occur?**
E.g. 800×600×8 – if you've tried more than one, please list them all

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
